ygData.subject: Hate...
ygData.msgSnippet: Question for all you Bards who spend a lot of time in Hate... I think my guild has now logged more hour in the new Hate, than any other Xegony guild. While
ygData.messageBody:
Question for all you Bards who spend a lot of time in Hate...

I think my guild has now logged more hour in the "new" Hate, than any
other Xegony guild. While this has been good for the guild, I still
have the same old problem -- what songs to play?

Pretend you are a level 54 bard, and are hunting Hate level 2 with 23
other people. Assume all the melee has the enchanter epic haste, and
each group, generally, contains an enchanter, a cleric, 2 melee, and
two caster. (Well, your group will have one caster and a bard.
*Smiles*)

Thoughts?

Gaelthorne,
Xegony
